did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Libros de bautismos y casamientos de Nuestra Senora de la Concepción de Papigóchic desde 28 de Julio de 1742 1742

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Mission Nuestra Senora de la Concepción de Papigóchic.

did.abstract: Jesuit mission in the chain known as the Tarahumara Alta. Photographs of pages from original holograph parish registers, July 28, 1742 to December 2, 1769.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.p: Libros de bautismos y casamientos de Nuestra Senora de la Concepción de Papigóchic desde 28 de Julio de 1742 (MS 175). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul M. Roca, 1980.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jesuit mission in the chain known as the Tarahumara Alta.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photographs of pages from original holograph parish registers, July 28, 1742 to December 2, 1769.
Photographed by P.D. Urbano. Ciudad Guererro, Chihuahua : Archives of La Purísima Concepción de Papigóchic, October 1971.
